alert.note: Alert for Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meagher County through 545 PM MDT... At 526 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles north of Clyde Park, or 33 miles northwest of Big Timber, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Meagher County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for central Montana.
